response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a discount, making it a cost-effective investment. We look forward to discussing the details with you and welcoming you as a valued client. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 950000}
